search.query: | inputlookup analyst_annotations.csv | table annotatedSubmissionTime annotatedUsername annotatedRating annotatedType annotatedTactic annotatedTechnique1 annotatedEventStart annotatedEventEnd annotatedAffectedAsset annotatedIndicator annotatedComment
| stats count(eval(annotatedTactic=="execution")) AS execution | eval execution=execution -1
| stats count(eval(annotatedTactic=="discovery")) AS discovery | eval discovery=discovery -1
| stats count(eval(annotatedTactic=="impact")) AS impact | eval impact=impact -1

| inputlookup mitre_attack_framework.csv | table initial_access execution persistence privilege_escalation defense_evasion credential_access discovery lateral_movement collection command_and_control exfiltration impact | rename discovery AS "Discovery" initial_access AS "Initial_Access" execution AS "Execution" persistence AS "Persistence" privilege_escalation AS "Privilege_Escalation" defense_evasion AS "Defense_Evasion" credential_access AS "Credential_Access" lateral_movement AS "Lateral_Movement" collection AS "Collection" command_and_control AS "Command_and_Control" exfiltration AS "Exfiltration" impact AS "Impact"
| join type=left "Defense_Evasion" [| inputlookup analyst_annotations.csv | search annotatedTactic="defense_evasion" | stats count by annotatedTechnique1 | rename annotatedTechnique1 AS "Defense_Evasion" count AS count5] | where Defense_Evasion!=" " | fillnull | eval "Defense_EvasionT" = (Defense_Evasion) . "|" . (count5)
| join type=left "Initial_Access" [| inputlookup analyst_annotations.csv | search annotatedTactic="initial_access" | stats count by annotatedTechnique1 | rename annotatedTechnique1 AS "Initial_Access" count AS count1] | where Initial_Access!=" " | fillnull | eval "Initial_AccessT" = (Initial_Access) . "|" . (count1)
| join type=left "Execution" [| inputlookup analyst_annotations.csv | search annotatedTactic="execution" | stats count by annotatedTechnique1 | rename annotatedTechnique1 AS "Execution" count AS count2] | where Execution!=" " | fillnull | eval "ExecutionT" = (Execution) . "|" . (count2)
| join type=left "Persistence" [| inputlookup analyst_annotations.csv | search annotatedTactic="persistence" | stats count by annotatedTechnique1 | rename annotatedTechnique1 AS "Persistence" count AS count3] | where Persistence!=" " | fillnull | eval "PersistenceT" = (Persistence) . "|" . (count3)
| join type=left "Privilege_Escalation" [| inputlookup analyst_annotations.csv | search annotatedTactic="privilege_escalation" | stats count by annotatedTechnique1 | rename annotatedTechnique1 AS "Privilege_Escalation" count AS count4] | where Privilege_Escalation!=" " | fillnull | eval "Privilege_EscalationT" = (Privilege_Escalation) . "|" . (count4)
| join type=left "Credential_Access" [| inputlookup analyst_annotations.csv | search annotatedTactic="credential_access" | stats count by annotatedTechnique1 | rename annotatedTechnique1 AS "Credential_Access" count AS count6] | where Credential_Access!=" " | fillnull | eval "Credential_AccessT" = (Credential_Access) . "|" . (count6)
| join type=left "Discovery" [| inputlookup analyst_annotations.csv | search annotatedTactic="discovery" | stats count by annotatedTechnique1 | rename annotatedTechnique1 AS Discovery count AS count7] | where Discovery!=" " | fillnull | eval DiscoveryT = (Discovery) . "|" . (count7)
| join type=left "Lateral_Movement" [| inputlookup analyst_annotations.csv | search annotatedTactic="lateral_movement" | stats count by annotatedTechnique1 | rename annotatedTechnique1 AS "Lateral_Movement" count AS count8] | where Lateral_Movement!=" " | fillnull | eval "Lateral_MovementT" = (Lateral_Movement) . "|" . (count8)
| join type=left "Collection" [| inputlookup analyst_annotations.csv | search annotatedTactic="collection" | stats count by annotatedTechnique1 | rename annotatedTechnique1 AS "Collection" count AS count9] | where Collection!=" " | fillnull | eval "CollectionT" = (Collection) . "|" . (count9)
| join type=left "Command_and_Control" [| inputlookup analyst_annotations.csv | search annotatedTactic="command_and_control" | stats count by annotatedTechnique1 | rename annotatedTechnique1 AS "Command_and_Control" count AS count10] | where Command_and_Control!=" " | fillnull | eval "C2" = (Command_and_Control) . "|" . (count10)
| join type=left "Exfiltration" [| inputlookup analyst_annotations.csv | search annotatedTactic="exfiltration" | stats count by annotatedTechnique1 | rename annotatedTechnique1 AS "Exfiltration" count AS count11] | where Exfiltration!=" " | fillnull | eval "ExfiltrationT" = (Exfiltration) . "|" . (count11)
| join type=left "Impact" [| inputlookup analyst_annotations.csv | search annotatedTactic="impact" | stats count by annotatedTechnique1 | rename annotatedTechnique1 AS "Impact" count AS count12] | where Impact!=" " | fillnull | eval "ImpactT" = (Impact) . "|" . (count12)
| eval Initial_Access=if(Initial_AccessT="0|0", null, Initial_AccessT) | eval Execution=if(ExecutionT="0|0", null, ExecutionT) | eval Persistence=if(PersistenceT="0|0", null, PersistenceT) | eval Privilege_Escalation=if(Privilege_EscalationT="0|0", null, Privilege_EscalationT) | eval Defense_Evasion=if(Defense_EvasionT="0|0", null, Defense_EvasionT) | eval Credential_Access=if(Credential_AccessT="0|0", null, Credential_AccessT) | eval Discovery=if(DiscoveryT="0|0", null, DiscoveryT) | eval Lateral_Movement=if(Lateral_MovementT="0|0", null, Lateral_MovementT) | eval Collection=if(CollectionT="0|0", null, CollectionT) | eval C2=if(C2="0|0", null, C2) | eval Exfiltration=if(ExfiltrationT="0|0", null, ExfiltrationT) | eval Impact=if(ImpactT="0|0", null, ImpactT)
| table "Initial_Access" "Execution" "Persistence" "Privilege_Escalation" "Defense_Evasion" "Credential_Access" "Discovery" "Lateral_Movement" "Collection" "C2" "Exfiltration" "Impact"
